item.title: GRAHAM CORP 10-K
item.description: GRAHAM CORP, which is in the General Industrial Machinery & Equipment [3560] industry, SEC 10-K filing on June 09, 2022 had 26275 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: 2022 - 321 instances fiscal - 281 instances 2021 - 226 instances 31 - 216 instances march - 203 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
